Texts.Chs: 要处理更为先进的矿石，你需要一门^orange;裂变反应炉^reset;。它甚至能熔化最坚硬的金属。但是你还有很多工作要做！为什么不从在一个较小的熔炉制作一些^orange;原体锭^reset;的这一步开始呢？
Texts.Eng: To process advanced ores, you'll need a ^orange;Fission Furnace^reset;. It can melt down even the strongest metals. But you've got some work to do to get one! Why not start by making some ^orange;Protocite Bars^reset; in a lesser furnace.

Texts.Chs: 如果没有裂变反应炉对那些高强度的金属进行加工，你的研究进度将止步不前。时刻让其待命。它绝对不会令你失望。
Texts.Eng: You won't get far without one of these doing its work on the higher-strength metals you are bound to find. Always have it ready to go. It will never let you down!
